# isListChoice

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the choice widget annotation is a list or a pop-up menu.

## Declaration

```swift
var isListChoice: Bool { get set }
```

## Configuring Choice Widget Annotations

- **choices**: An array of strings that specifies the options in either a list or a pop-up menu.
- **values**: An array of strings that specifies the export values for items in a list or a pop-up menu.

items.description: An array of strings that specifies the options in either a list or a pop-up menu.
